review: works better than expected, load fast, am using on smart tv that aready has all the functions but is real slow, this works much better
author: ROGER

review: No casting from laptop or web browser.
author: John Paul

review: It's amazing it has surpassed any expectations I had about the product very fast, responsive and tons of content
author: pedro eusebio

review: Just what I needed. Works like a charm.
author: KennMarler

review: A good device for the $20 I paid but not worth the $40. I have had issue as have others with resolution. I primarily bought this to use in conjunction with Plex and to be honest I haven't determined if the issue is related to the Plex app or the fire stick. All I know is that the video quality from streaming on the local network is no where near as good as the Chromecast I purchased a year ago.
author: B. Boyer "Bboy"

review: The software needs a bit more polishing (improve ease of navigation, reduce redundancy in the interface, and fix interface lag) but great for a version 1.0
author: Josh

review: Absolutely awesome except that it does not have the vudu or disney movies anywhere apps. Otherwise, it is prefect and incredible for the price.
author: Elizabeth Story

review: Sometimes loses connection with cable signal
